article: There is no quick and easy way to learn English. But there is a simple and good way. Speak and listen English as  much .  as you can. Speak only English  _  your teacher and your classmates. Speak English with them while you are in class and  out of  class. Listen to your teacher when he speaks to you in English  _  class. Listen to your classmates when they speak English to you out of class. Listen to English  _  the radio--the Voice of America and on the television--Follow me. Speak, listen and read English as much as you can. Don't  _  read the textbooks that you use in class. Go to the library of your school,  _  to a bookshop and read some books.
